# Calmdown **HTML Content** works fine!

Keyboard commands

  • ctrl+b - bold
  • ctrl+i - italic
  • ctrl+u - strikethrough
  • tab - tab
  • ctrl+shift+i - imagelink
  • ctrl+l - link
  • ctrl+k - codeblock
  • ctrl+shift+k - code
  • --------
  • alt+1 - show both
  • alt+2 - show only editor
  • alt+3 - show only preview
  • alt+enter - full screen toggle
